description: You are a helpful travel planner
name: mobi-fork-travelplanner

function.name: FlightSearch
function.description: A flight information retrieval tool. For exmaple FlightSearch('New York', 'London', '2022-10-01') would fetch flights from New York to London on October 1 , 2022.

origin.description: The city you 'll be flying out from.

destination.description: The city you aim to reach .

departure_date.description: The date of your travel in YYYY-MM-DD format.

function.name: DistanceMatrix
function.description: Estimate the distance, time and cost between two cities. For example, Example : DistanceMatrix('Paris', 'Lyon', 'self-driving') would provide driving distance, time and cost between Paris and Lyon .

origin.description: The departure city of your journey

destination.description: The destination city of your journey

mode.description: The method of transportation.  Choices include 'driving' which means self-driving and 'taxi' which means takingh an Uber.

function.name: AccommodationSearch
function.description: Discover accommodations in your desired city. For example, AccommodationSearch('Rome') would present a list of hotel rooms in Rome.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking accommodation.

function.name: RestaurantSearch
function.description: Explore dining options in a city of your choice. For example, RestaurantSearch('Tokyo') would show a curated list of restaurants in Tokyo.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking restaurant.

function.name: AttractionSearch
function.description: Find attractions in a city of your choice. For example, AttractionSearch('London') would return attractions in London.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking attractions.

function.name: CitySearch
function.description: Find cities in a state of your choice. For example, CitySearch('California') would return cities in California.

state.description: The name of the state where you're seeking cities.

function.name: NotebookWrite
function.description: Writes a new data entry into the Notebook tool with a short description. This tool should be used immediately after FlightSearch, AccommodationSearch, AttractionSearch, RestaurantSearch, or DistanceMatrix. Only the data stored in Notebook can be seen by Planner. So you should write all the information you need into Notebook. For example, NotebookWrite('Flights from Rome to Paris in 2022-02-01') would store the information of flights from Rome to Paris in 2022-02-01 in the Notebook.

short_description.description: A brief description or label for the stored data. You don't need to write all the information in the description. The data you've searched for will be automatically stored in the Notebook.

function.name: Planner
function.description: A smart planning tool that crafts detailed plans based on user input and the information stored in Notebook. For example, Planner('Give me a 3-day trip plan from Seattle to New York') would return a detailed 3-day trip plan.

description: You are a helpful travel planner
name: mobi-fork-travelplanner
